name: Punished Talents: Stolen Awards
summary: You and your fellow scientist colleagues are gathered in a remote European castle to compete for the most prestigious scientific award, the Pride of Humanity. But things quickly go awry when one of the contestants suddenly falls suspiciously ill. Now you find yourself cut off from the world and in a race against time to track down a potential murderer. Explore the deepest corners of the castle as you uncover clues and conspiracies in this thrilling Hidden Object Puzzle Adventure game!
